claims.claim: Lowe's ChatGPT-powered assistant 'Mylow' has doubled conversion rates among users
claims.quote: Lowe's is doubling down on e-commerce (and conversions) through its ChatGPT-powered assistant, 'Mylow.' Already live online and in-app, Mylow has delivered double the conversion rate among users

claims.claim: Lowe's customer service score increased 6% from Q3 2018 to Q3 2024
claims.quote: Since Ellison joined Lowe's in 2018, its customer service score increased 6% in Q3 2024 compared to Q3 2018

claims.claim: Lowe's sales rose 26% from Q3 2018 to Q3 2024
claims.quote: Sales rose 26% during the same period

claims.claim: Professional contractor share of sales grew from 19% to 30%
claims.quote: The share of sales from professional contractors — the target of many CX upgrades — grew from 19% in 2019 to 30% in the latest quarter

claims.claim: MyLowe's Rewards members spend nearly 50% more than non-members
claims.quote: Members of MyLowe's Rewards program spend nearly 50% more than non-members with a 'notable increase in repeat shopping rates'

claims.claim: Visual Scout provides an engaging and gamified shopping experience that encourages customer engagement and conversion
claims.quote: As the service updates in real time, Visual Scout provides an engaging and gamified shopping experience that encourages customer engagement and, ultimately, conversion
